card.name: Wasp
card.property: Small but Mighty - Response: After Wasp (or an event you play) defeats a minion or side scheme, deal 1 damage to the villain.
"You should learn to play nice!"

alternate.name: Nadia Van Dyne
alternate.property: G.I.R.L. - Action: Shuffle up to 2 cards with a printed [mental] resource from your discard pile into your deck. (Limit once per round.)
"G.I.R.L. is dedicated to finding brilliant women who will not only save the world, but change it."

alternate.name: Wasp
alternate.property: Damage you deal using your basic attack power (ATK) can be divided among enemies as you choose. Threat you remove using your basic thwart power (THW) can be divided among schemes as you choose.

card.name: Ant-Man
card.property: While you are in [[Giant]] hero form, Ant-Man gains the [[Giant]] trait and gets +1 ATK. While you are in [[Tiny]] hero form, Ant-Man gains the [[Tiny]] trait and gets +1 THW.

card.name: Giant Help
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme (remove a total of 4 threat divided among schemes as you choose instead if you are in [[Giant]] hero form).
"Glad to be of service!" - Wasp

card.name: Pinpoint Strike
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 7 damage to an enemy. If you are in [[Tiny]] hero form, this attack deals 1 additional damage to that enemy and gains overkill.
"You're going to want to ice that in the morning." - Wasp

card.name: Rapid Growth
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When you use one of your hero's basic powers (THW, ATK, or DEF), change to your [[Giant]] hero form and get +2 to that power for this use.
"bet you didn't expect to see that." - Wasp

card.name: Wasp Sting
card.property: Hero Action (attack): If you are in [[Giant]] hero form, deal a total of 4 damage divided among enemies you choose. Hero Action (attack): If you are in [[Tiny]] hero form, deal 5 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Pym Particles
card.property: Hero Response: After you spend this card, heal 2 damage from your hero if you are in [[Giant]] hero form or draw 1 card if you are in [[Tiny]] hero form.

card.name: Red Room Training
card.property: While you are in [[Giant]] hero form, you gain retaliate 1. While you are in [[Tiny]] hero form, your basic attacks gain piercing. (Discard any tough status cards from the target before dealing damage.)

card.name: Bio-Synthetic Wings
card.property:
Wasp gains the [[Aerial]] trait.
Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, if you are in [[Tiny]] hero form, exhaust Bio-Synthetic Wings â†’ prevent 1 of that damage.

card.name: Wasp's Helmet
card.property: While you are in [[Giant]] hero form, you get +1 THW. While you are in [[Tiny]] hero form, you get +1 ATK.

card.name: Thor
card.property: Response: After you play Thor from your hand, deal 2 damage to the villain (3 damage instead if you paid for this card using a [physical] resource).
"You wanna eat my hammer? Then by all means, take a big bite!"

card.name: Wasp
card.property:
Wasp gets +1 hit point for each pym counter on her.
Interrupt: When Wasp enters play, place 1 pym counter on her (to a maximum of 3) for each [energy] resource you overpaid for Wasp's cost.

card.name: Into the Fray
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 6 damage to a minion. For each point of excess damage dealt by this attack, remove 1 threat from the main scheme.

card.name: Surprise Attack
card.property: Hero Response (attack): After you change form, deal 3 damage to an enemy (4 damage instead if you paid for this card using [physical] resource).

card.name: Boot Camp
card.property:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
Each ally you control gets +1 ATK.
"YOU CALL THAT A PUSHUP! MY GRANDMOTHER DOES BETTER PUSHUPS!"

card.name: Lie in Wait
card.property:
Max 1 per player.
Hero Response (attack): After a minion engages you, discard Lie in Wait â†’ deal 3 damage to that minion.

card.name: Ironheart
card.property: Response: After you play Ironheart from your hand, draw 1 card.
"I'm totally going to be like Tony Stark! Except for that weird facial hair."

card.name: Spider-Man
card.property: Response: After you play Spider-Man from your hand, choose THW or ATK. Spider-Man gets +2 to the chosen power until the end of the phase.
"I'm needed. And just like that, none of the rest of it matters."

card.name: Swarm Tactics
card.property:
Team-Up (Ant-Man and Wasp). Max 1 per deck.
Hero Action: Change to your other hero form. Ready your hero.

card.name: The Power in All of Us
card.property: Max 2 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates when paying for a Basic (gray) card.

card.name: Running Interference
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[Avenger]] trait. Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from the main scheme. Remove X additional threat from the main scheme (to a maximum of 3), where X is equal to the villain's stage number.

card.name: All for One
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy and exhaust any number of [[Avenger]] characters you control. Deal 1 additional damage to that enemy for each character exhausted this way.

card.name: Perseverance
card.property: Hero Response: After you change form, give your hero a tough status card.
"You do know the front door is unlocked, right?" - Spider-Man

card.name: Athletic Conditioning
card.property: Hero Action: Discard 1 stun or confuse status card from your hero.
"Don't worry, the ringing in your ears will go away... eventually." - Nadia Van Dyne

card.name: Red Dreams
card.property:
Give to the Nadia Van Dyne player.
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
- Exhaust Nadia Van Dyne â†’ remove Red Dreams from the game.
- Discard each card with a printed [mental] resource from your hand and take 1 damage. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Mother's Orders
card.property: As an additional cost for each hero to make a basic attack, that hero must spend 1 of any resource.
Mother has sent one of her most devious henchmen after Wasp, hoping to recapture the Red Room escapee.

card.name: Beetle
card.property: Guard. Forced Interrupt: When Beetle is defeated, choose to either spend a [physical] resource or shuffle Beetle into the encounter deck. (Wasp's nemesis minion.)

card.name: Beetle Armor MK IV
card.property: Attach to Beetle, if able. If you cannot, attach to the villain. Attached Character gets +4 hit points.
"Ugh, why can't I ever find anything around here?" - Janice Lincoln

card.name: Beetle Mania
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Beetle attacks you with +1 ATK. If no attack was made this way, this card gains surge.
"I was waiting for this moment to arise." - Beetle
